Looking for a iPhone XR front-facing camera replacement? If you dropped your Apple iPhone XR and broke the front-facing camera it can be repaired!

You can replace your broken Apple iPhone XR front-facing camera using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

entry.title: iPhone XR Earpiece Speaker & Flex
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Ear Speaker
Price: 29.99

Replace a malfunctioning earpiece speaker in your iPhone XR and fix problems with phone call audio. This speaker is used to listen while the phone is held to your ear. This speaker is soldered to a flex cable as part of an assembly including the flood illuminator and proximity sensor. Replacing the earpiece speaker part of this assembly requires microsoldering.

entry.title: New Replacement Battery Compatible For iPhone XR
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 23.99

You have a Apple iPhone XR that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Apple iPhone XR shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Apple iPhone XR replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Apple iPhone XR are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Apple batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Apple iPhone XR.

Warranty

The Replacement Apple iPhone XR Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Apple Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Battery
Compatible Model iPhone XR
Battery Type Non-removable Li-Ion 2942 mAh battery
Device Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

Looking for an iPhone XR screen replacement ? If you dropped your iPhone XR and broke the front glass it can be repaired ! You can replace your broken iPhone screen easily. The repair takes just a few minutes with our replacement parts.

The screens for iPhone XR LCD Screens and Digitizers are built with noticeably higher brightness and contrast than others. Certified screens are custom built to match or exceed our strict specification standards in terms of brightness and color reproduction.
